parties: Ekanayake Mudiyanselage Heen Manike and Another   Vs   Moratuwa Municipal Council and Others
keywords: Section 73(1) and 77 of the Municipal Council Ordinance,  what is meant by words “it shall be lawful”,  futile Application,  alternative remedy.
legistation: Municipal Council Ordinance No. 29 of 1947, The Constitution of  the Democratic Republic of Sri Lanka.
